channel.title: NPC Dialogues

item.title: NPC Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[code]public void handleEmpty() {
c.getDH().sendOption2(“Yes, Empty my inventory please.”, “No, don’t empty my inventory.”);
c.dialogueAction = 850;
}

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“empty”)) {
c.getPA().handleEmpty();
}

case 9157:
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 850) {
c.getPA().removeAllItems();

case 9158:
if (c.dialogueAction == 850) {
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
return;
}[/code]

Enjoy inb4asksforhelpcuzhestostupidtoadd

item.title: NPC Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @ImDatBoss ImDatBoss
item.description:
@ImDatBoss wrote:

:fp: ^ these guys
First of all, since your sending 2 options, and not one replace sendOption line with this:

sendOption("Yes, Empty my inventory please.", "No, don't empty my inventory.");

Secondly, under

if (playerCommand.startsWith("empty")) {

add

int i = 1;

Should work.

item.title: NPC Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Try this:

public emptyDio() {
switch(WHAT EVER INT HERE){
case 1:
   sendStatement("Are you sure you want to empty your inventory?");
   c.dialogueAction = 1;   c.nextChat = 2;   break;


case 2:
   sendOption("Yes, Empty my inventory please.", "No, don't empty my inventory.");
   c.dialogueAction = 1;
   c.nextChat = 0;
   break;
   }
}

Then for the command it should be something like:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("empty")) {
                                c.emptyDio().sendDialogues(1, THE INT HERE);
                        }

I don’t see the delete inventory action though, haha.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

I’m trying to make a dialpgue for my empty command here is what I have so far.

case 1:
			sendStatement("Are you sure you want to empty your inventory?");
			c.dialogueAction = 1;
			c.nextChat = 2;
			break;
		case 2:
			sendOption("Yes, Empty my inventory please.", "No, don't empty my inventory.");
			c.dialogueAction = 1;
			c.nextChat = 0;
			break;

But how do I make that show up when I type empty?

This is my attempt;

if (playerCommand.startsWith("empty")) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(1, i);
			}

Note: I want it to execute when I type a command, not talk to a player so i’m not sure about the i thing.

Please help.

Read full topic
